scripts.redirect_server: cross-env REDIRECT=TRUE PORT=443 HTTP_PORT=80 CERTFILE=/etc/letsencrypt/live/comet.photos/fullchain.pem KEYFILE=/etc/letsencrypt/live/comet.photos/privkey.pem VISFILE=../data/visTableV3.5.bin node cometserver.js
scripts.redirect_pc: cross-env REDIRECT=TRUE PORT=443 HTTP_PORT=80 CERTFILE=../dataonlyserver/localhost+2.pem KEYFILE=../dataonlyserver/localhost+2-key.pem VISFILE=../data/visTableV3.5.bin node cometserver.js
scripts.local: cross-env LAUNCHBROWSER=TRUE PORT=8082 VISFILE=../data/visTableV3.5.bin node cometserver.js
